title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: A young Kokiri boy discovers that his destiny is to free the Seven Sages and save the land of Hyrule from the treacherous sorcerer Ganondorf.

title: SoulCalibur
description: Weapon-based 3D fighting game. Warriors seek the legendary sword Soul Edge. Highest Metascoring game on Dreamcast (Sep 1999).

title: Grand Theft Auto IV
description: What does the American Dream mean today? For Niko Belic, fresh off the boat from Europe, it's the hope he can escape his past. For his cousin Roman, it is the vision that together they can find fortune in Liberty City. As they slip into debt and are dragged into a criminal underworld, they discover the reality is very different from the dream. Metacritic's 2008 PS3 Game of the Year.

title: Super Mario Galaxy
description: Mario travels across galaxies to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser and collect Power Stars.

title: Super Mario Galaxy 2
description: Mario and Yoshi journey through new galaxies to save Princess Peach and defeat Bowser.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Link awakens from a deep slumber and sets out to save the kingdom of Hyrule from the malevolent Calamity Ganon.

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
description: Arcade skateboarding game featuring professional skaters and trick-based gameplay.

title: Perfect Dark (2000)
description: Agent Joanna Dark hits the ground running in Perfect Dark, an epic tale of galactic conspiracies in 2023 America. Classic FPS from Rare (N64, May 2000).

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Follows outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang, led by Dutch Van der Linde, as they struggle to cope with the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 20th century.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Three very different criminals team up for a series of heists and walk into some of the most thrilling experiences in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

title: Metroid Prime
description: Samus returns in a new mission to unravel the mystery behind the ruined walls scattered across Tallon IV. Play as the bounty hunter and view the world through her visor; shoot locked switches, solve puzzles, and eliminate enemies. Explore and recover power-ups and weapons to open new areas. (Retro Studios, Nov 2002).

title: Grand Theft Auto III
description: A silent protagonist escapes a heist gone wrong and rises through the criminal underworld of Liberty City.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: Mario embarks on a globe-trotting journey to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans.

title: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: Master Chief and Cortana fight the Covenant and the Flood aboard the ring world Halo.

title: NFL 2K1
description: American football simulation featuring NFL teams and players.

title: Half-Life 2
description: Gordon Freeman returns to fight the Combine, an alien empire that has conquered Earth, with help from the resistance.

title: BioShock
description: A plane crash survivor discovers the underwater city of Rapture and must fight against genetically altered inhabitants while uncovering the city's dark secrets.

title: GoldenEye 007
description: James Bond infiltrates a Soviet facility to prevent the use of a satellite weapon.

title: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves
description: Nathan Drake races to find the lost city of Shambhala and the Cintamani Stone.

title: Resident Evil 4 (2005)
description: Special agent Leon S. Kennedy is sent on a mission to rescue the U.S. President's daughter from a sinister cult in rural Spain.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Return to Faerun in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, and the lure of absolute power. Mysterious abilities are awakening inside you.

title: The Orange Box
description: Compilation containing Half-Life 2, Episode One, Episode Two, Team Fortress 2, and Portal.

title: Tekken 3
description: Fighting game featuring the King of Iron Fist Tournament and a diverse roster of fighters.

title: Mass Effect 2
description: After being revived from death, Commander Shepard must assemble a team, battle a new threat, and make tough choices to save the galaxy from total annihilation.

title: The House in Fata Morgana - Dreams of the Revenants Edition -
description: A gothic suspense tale set in a cursed mansion. Full-length visual novel spanning nearly a millennium that deals in tragedy, human nature, and insanity. (HuneX, Apr 2021, Switch/PS4).

title: Elden Ring
description: In a dark fantasy world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin, the player is a Tarnished who must restore the Elden Ring and become the Elden Lord.

title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: The Dragonborn must defeat the dragon Alduin and save the world from destruction in the province of Skyrim.

title: Half-Life
description: Half-Life combines great storytelling with intense action and advanced technology to create a frighteningly realistic world where players need to think smart to survive. Won more than 50 Game of the Year awards; named Best PC Game Ever in PC Gamer. (Valve, Nov 1998).

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Link must explore the lands above and below Hyrule to find a way to stop Ganondorf from destroying the kingdom.

title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
description: Link sets sail on the Great Sea to rescue his sister and defeat Ganondorf in a cel-shaded oceanic adventure.

title: Gran Turismo
description: Groundbreaking racing simulation featuring licensed cars and realistic driving physics.

title: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
description: Solid Snake and Raiden uncover a conspiracy involving the Patriots and a new Metal Gear.

title: Grand Theft Auto Double Pack
description: Compilation containing Grand Theft Auto III and Grand Theft Auto: Vice City.

title: Portal: Companion Collection
description: Collection of Portal and Portal 2 for Nintendo Switch.

title: Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn
description: The Bhaalspawn continues their journey through Amn to confront the wizard Irenicus.

title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
description: In 1992, Carl CJ Johnson comes home after a family tragedy to find the streets of Los Santos overtaken by crime and corruption.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
description: Enhanced edition of Tears of the Kingdom for Nintendo Switch 2.

title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
description: Tommy Vercetti builds a criminal empire in 1980s Vice City after a deal goes wrong.

title: LittleBigPlanet
description: Sackboy embarks on a creative platforming adventure with robust level creation tools.

title: The Legend of Zelda Collector's Edition
description: Compilation of The Legend of Zelda, Zelda II, Ocarina of Time, and Majora's Mask for GameCube.

title: Gran Turismo 3: A-Spec
description: Racing simulation with improved graphics and a wide selection of cars and tracks.

title: Halo 2
description: Master Chief and the Arbiter fight the Covenant and the Flood in the continuing Halo saga.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
description: Link has three days to prevent the moon from destroying Termina using the power of masks.

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past / Four Swords
description: Classic Zelda adventure with a multiplayer Four Swords mode for Game Boy Advance.

title: The Last of Us
description: Joel and Ellie journey across a post-pandemic America in a story of survival and connection.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
description: Link is drawn into the Twilight Realm and must save Hyrule from shadow and light.

title: Madden NFL 2003
description: American football simulation featuring NFL teams and updated rosters.

title: Persona 5 Royal
description: A group of high school students discover they can enter the hearts of corrupt adults and steal the source of their evil desires.

title: The Last of Us Remastered
description: The Last of Us remastered for PlayStation 4 with improved visuals and performance.

title: Red Dead Redemption
description: A former outlaw, John Marston, is forced by the federal government to hunt down the members of his old gang during the decline of the American frontier in 1911.

title: Hades II
description: MelinoÃ«, daughter of Hades, must battle through the Underworld to defeat Chronos. Roguelike from Supergiant; v1.0 released Sep 2025 (Early Access May 2024).

title: Portal 2
description: Chell awakens in Aperture Science and must escape again, this time with the help of a personality core named Wheatley.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition
description: Enhanced edition of Breath of the Wild for Nintendo Switch 2.

title: Astro Bot
description: Astro Bot embarks on a platforming adventure to rescue his crew across varied worlds. PS5 exclusive (Sep 2024); 2024's highest-rated standalone game on Metacritic.

title: Final Fantasy IX
description: Zidane and his companions journey to stop the sorceress Queen Brahne and uncover the truth of their world.

title: God of War
description: After wiping out the gods of Mount Olympus, Kratos moves on to the frigid lands of Scandinavia, where he and his son must embark on an odyssey across a dangerous world.

title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4
description: Skateboarding game with new levels, skaters, and trick options.

title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree
description: Expansion set in the Land of Shadow, following the story of Miquella and the realm beyond the Erdtree.

title: Devil May Cry
description: Dante hunts demons on the island of Mallet to avenge his mother and confront his brother Vergil.

title: Madden NFL 2002
description: American football simulation featuring NFL teams and gameplay improvements.
